snippet: In “The Sacrament,” written and directed by Ti West, two journalists accompany a man traveling to meet his sister, a recovering addict, at a compound in a foreign country.
abstract: Manohla Dargis reviews movie The Sacrament, written and directed by Ti West and starring Joe Swanberg and A J Bowen.
lead_paragraph: In “The Sacrament,” written and directed by Ti West, two journalists accompany a man traveling to meet his sister, a recovering addict, at a compound in a foreign country.

headline.print_headline: A Horror Story Borrows From History
headline.main: A Horror Story Borrows From History
